Class Database

java.lang.Object
Database
public class Database
extends java.lang.Object
This class implements the APIs between the database and the rest of the program.
Author:
rachelmao

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean addPokemon​(Pokemon pokemon)
    This method adds a Pokemon into the database.
    boolean archivePokemon​(Pokemon pokemon)
    This method archives a Pokemon.
    void closeConnection()
    Closes the connection to the database.
    void connectDatabase()
    Connects to the database.
    static Database getInstance()
    This method creates a new or returns the current instance of the Database.
    java.util.ArrayList<Pokemon> getPokemon()
    This method returns a Pokemon ArrayList containing all Pokemon in the database.
    boolean republishPokemon​(Pokemon pokemon)
    This method republishes an archived Pokemon.
    void updateDatabase​(Pokemon pokemon)
    This method updates the value of a pokemon in the Database.
    void updatePokemon​(Pokemon pokemon)
    This method updates the values in a Pokemon object.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Method Details

    • updatePokemon

      public void updatePokemon​(Pokemon pokemon)
      This method updates the values in a Pokemon object. NOTE: this method should be called after a Pokemon's data is changed in the database.
      Parameters:
      pokemon - the Pokemon object to be updated.

    • updateDatabase

      public void updateDatabase​(Pokemon pokemon)
      This method updates the value of a pokemon in the Database. NOTE: this method should be called after there is a change in the Pokemon object's data
      Parameters:
      pokemon - the Pokemon object whose data in the database must be updated.

    • addPokemon

      public boolean addPokemon​(Pokemon pokemon)
      This method adds a Pokemon into the database.
      Parameters:
      pokemon - the Pokemon to be added.
      Returns:
      if the Pokemon was successfully added.

    • archivePokemon

      public boolean archivePokemon​(Pokemon pokemon)
      This method archives a Pokemon.
      Parameters:
      pokemon - the Pokemon to be archived.
      Returns:
      if the Pokemon was successfully archived.

    • republishPokemon

      public boolean republishPokemon​(Pokemon pokemon)
      This method republishes an archived Pokemon.
      Parameters:
      pokemon - the Pokemon to be republished.
      Returns:
      if the Pokemon was successfully republished;

    • getPokemon

      public java.util.ArrayList<Pokemon> getPokemon()
      This method returns a Pokemon ArrayList containing all Pokemon in the database.
      Returns:
      an ArrayList containing all Pokemon in the database.

    • connectDatabase

      public void connectDatabase() throws java.sql.SQLException
      Connects to the database.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException

    • closeConnection

      public void closeConnection() throws java.sql.SQLException
      Closes the connection to the database.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException

    • getInstance

      public static Database getInstance() throws java.sql.SQLException
      This method creates a new or returns the current instance of the Database.
      Returns:
      the current instance of the Database
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException
